nodes.text: Saylor Marjan was a native of the planet Arapia. He was a longtime friend of Toob Ancher.

Saylor was a friend of Toob Ancher until they had an argument and didn't speak to each other for about 20 years. During those years, Saylor incurred a debt to Saadoon-Kauldi, which was collected by Toob Ancher and Fahs Oxsor on the planet Redcap.
